00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: camel_case.php 200 2009-02-22 19:10:02Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief Converts variables in files from underscored case to lower camel case.
00005  * 
00006  * call cDir() with the directory of the files you wish to change.
00007  * 
00008  * Will only effect \c $undersored_words and \c $this->undersocred_words.
00009  * 
00010  * @file
00011  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00012  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00013  * @copyright   2009 David Singer
00014  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00015  * @version     2.0.1
00016  */
00017 // !!! CHANGE THIS TO MATCH YOUR SERVER !!!
00018 define('BASE_DIR', '/var/www/ramaboo/');
00019 require_once '/var/www/ramaboo/config/dev.ramaboo.com.php';
00020 require_once '/var/www/Boo-2.0.0/Boo.php';
00021 
00022 function c($word) {
00023     return Boo_Helper::toCamelCase($word);
00024 }
00025 
00026 function cFile($filename) {
00027     
00028     $ext = Boo_Helper::getFileExtension($filename);
00029     
00030     if ($ext != 'php') {
00031         return true; // not PHP file
00032     }
00033     
00034     // do not fix this file - BAD THINGS WILL HAPPEN!!!
00035     if (basename($filename) == 'camel_case.php') {
00036         echo "Skip: {$filename}<br />";
00037         return true;
00038     }
00039     
00040     // do not fix
00041     if (basename($filename) == 'Smarty.php') {
00042         echo "Skip: {$filename}<br />";
00043         return true;
00044     }
00045     
00046     $convert = file_get_contents($filename);
00047     
00048     $reg = '/(\$this->\w*|\$\w*)/e';
00049     $rep = 'c(\'$1\')';
00050     $done = preg_replace($reg, $rep, $convert);
00051     
00052     // fix PHP superglobals - this is ugly but it works
00053     $done = preg_replace('/\$SERVER/', '$_SERVER', $done);
00054     $done = preg_replace('/\$GET/', '$_GET', $done);
00055     $done = preg_replace('/\$POST/', '$_POST', $done);
00056     $done = preg_replace('/\$FILES/', '$_FILES', $done);
00057     $done = preg_replace('/\$COOKIE/', '$_COOKIE', $done);
00058     $done = preg_replace('/\$SESSION/', '$_SESSION', $done);
00059     $done = preg_replace('/\$REQUEST/', '$_REQUEST', $done);
00060     $done = preg_replace('/\$ENV/', '$_ENV', $done);
00061     
00062     $fp = fopen($filename, 'w');
00063     fwrite($fp, $done);
00064     fclose($fp);
00065     echo "Done: {$filename}<br/>";
00066 }
00067 
00068 function cDir($path) {
00069     $dir = opendir($path);
00070         
00071     if (!$dir) {
00072         trigger_error("Path {$path} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00073         return false;
00074     }
00075     
00076     while (($file = readdir($dir)) !== false) {
00077         
00078         if ($file != '.' && $file != '..' && substr($file, -1) != '~' && substr($file, 0, 4) != '.svn') {
00079             if (is_dir($path . '/' . $file)){
00080                 // recursive
00081                 if ($file == 'lib') {
00082                     echo 'Entering lib directory (skipping)<br />';
00083                 } else {
00084                     echo "Recursive: {$file}<br/>";
00085                     cDir($path . '/' . $file);
00086                 }
00087             }
00088             else {
00089                 
00090                 cFile($path . '/' . $file);
00091             }
00092         }
00093     }
00094     
00095     // close dir
00096     closedir($dir);
00097 }
